p: All operations were performed under nitrogen by using conventional Schlenk-line techniques. Solvents were purified by degassing with N 2 and passing over activated (8 hours, N 2 purge, 300 °C) Al 2O 3, and stored under nitrogen. The cocatalyst was a commercial MAO from Witco AG (10 % wt solution in toluene).Me 2Si(Me 4Cp)(NtBu)TiCl 2 was purchased from Witco AG.
